User manual for the Prioritizing Nature webtool

This user’s manual aims to provide a clear and concise overview on the use of the Prioritizing Nature web tool, developed within the framework of the Prioritizing Nature project in Ecuador and Peru.

To see the relevant webtool manual for your corresponding country, please select from below:

  • Prioritizing Nature in Ecuador
  • Prioritizing Nature in Peru
